__e: And when he died, I looked up to God and I said those words. Because my father was so young, so full of life, so full of dreams.
I looked in the mirror this morning, and it was like I was looking at a man I'd never seen before.
Didn't think much of it but then I looked half an hour later, he was still standing here.
I looked up and there was a chap striding towards me... holding a British passport in his hand. [chuckles]
Checked his phone, and there it all was.
I looked at my watch. - And...
I mean, he just stood there looking at me like I was the crazy one.
And he looked back to me and said, "Oh, yeah and what do you do?"
And I'm nervous, looking around for more of whatever he's on.
I looked around.. and just felt such a pity for everyone.. all that fear.
This man was standing in his window, looking at me.
My father did this to me and my mother stood there and watched.
Anyway, I look up at him... and for the first time in my life, I see how much my father loved me.
And she looked me in the eye, and she said...
And the dear girl looked me right in the eye and said...
So I went back to reexamine the body.
[Henderson] I remember looking at them thinking, "I know you.
He was looking at her when he said that she would destroy us.
When she walked into the house, she looked in the living room, and you know what she saw?
